# Input Files:

```{r import}
    print(params$Count.file)
    print(params$QC.file)
    print(params$FEdata)
```


# Load data

```{r load, echo=TRUE, eval=TRUE}
load(params$FEdata)
```

## Experimental design

The experimental plan that was set up has `r FE@colDataStruc["n_dFac"]` parameters.


```{r design}
    lapply(FE@design@List.Factors,summary)
```

## Count matrix

```{r count}
head(assay(FE))
```


# QC

## Design QC

```{r QCdesign, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
mvQCdesign(FE,axis=params$nAxis)
```

## data QC 

```{r QCdata}
mvQCdata(FE,axis=params$nAxis)
```
